messages.subject: SORRY about not changing "Weaning."
messages.msgSnippet: SORRY about not changing Weaning. I m really sorry.  A post which hasn t yet shown up is called weaning because it was near the beginning of the discussion
messages.messageBody:
SORRY about not changing "Weaning."

I'm really sorry. A post which hasn't yet shown up is called "weaning"
because it was near the beginning of the discussion about whether Bible
literalism should change the way people feel about weaning babies... I
should've changed it because my post was response to a question about WHERE
in the Bible it said Jesus was coming right back, everyone should just wait.
